sense.name: Property that is leased or rented out or let.
sense.examples: The lease is available starting tomorrow. This street is full of leases but very few are for sale.

sense.name: A contract granting use or occupation of property under certain terms or conditions.
sense.examples: The lease will run for six months. I'll draw up a lease this evening. Sign the lease and return it to the address listed.

sense.name: The period of time during which a leasing contract is in effect.
sense.examples: The lease is up in a matter of days. This lease will end on June 12.
